did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: University of Connecticut. Women's Studies Program.

did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, Women's Studies Program Records.
did.abstract: The Women's Studies Program at the University of Connecticut began in 1974 and was the first formal program of its kind in the state. The collection consists of Connecticut Humanities Council grant files, administrative records, announcement, fliers and publications.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The Women's Studies Program at the University of Connecticut began in 1974 and was the first formal program of its kind in the state.

The Women's Studies Program is a flexible interdisciplinary academic program devoted to the critical analysis of gender and the pursuit of knowledge about women. Combining methods and insights of traditional academic disciplines with the special insights of Women's Studies scholarship, our courses yield fresh perspectives, which illuminate the origins of and changes in diverse cultural and social arrangements. Additional information on the program is available on the program website.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains files pertaining to a 1982 Connecticut Humanities Council grant, administrative files, publications, announcements and fliers.
Researchers are reminded to request the Subject file for "Women's Studies" for materials dated after 2007.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged alphabetically in one series.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This record series is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], University of Connecticut, Women's Studies Program Records. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials in the collection have been pulled from transfers of faculty files, administrative transfers and internal collection of ephemeral materials.
